title: To get Brexit done, Britain and Ireland must find the Wirral way forward together
text:
Even an ardent Brexiteer would smile wryly reading University College Dublin’s forthcoming November course on ‘Winning Negotiation Strategies’ in the City of London.

“Giving you the tools and skills needed to defend your interests and attain your goals in negotiation.”

Providing “strategies for achieving better outcomes.”

Enhancing your skills and “repertoire of tactics” by adopting “a comprehensive framework of negotiation strategies.”

Who’s giving the course? Michel Barnier?

Even Nigel Farage has publicly praised the “really clever negotiator” Barnier, telling him he wishes he was batting on the British side.

It’s clear that the European Union have approached this process with the cunning...
description: Even an ardent Brexiteer would smile wryly reading University College Dublin’s forthcoming November course on ‘Winning Negotiation Strategies’ in the City of London.
